description:
Beef stew: a legendary dragon’s most prized treasure lies on the other side of a certain door. Breakfast set: a starving Aletta wanders into the Restaurant to Another World and believes herself to be dreaming, but she’s in for a shock when she wakes up the next morning.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ragoût de bœuf et formule petit-déjeuner
ビーフシチュー / モーニング
